news.Content: We have just updated HE to the latest garena build!
Hello everyone, we are now up to date for 7.11 and are still safe to use :).

Fixed an issue with drawings
Now working on resolving an issue causing orbwalker to not attack enemy champions
and not casting spells on them.
HE has been updated for patch 7.10HF and is undetected and safe to use Kappa.
